response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would greatly enhance your endeavors and contribute significantly to your success. This unique item is valued at $1,000,000 by you, which aligns perfectly with its exceptional quality and utility. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive unparalleled value while also allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
